DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness CentriMag ventricular assist system help pediatric patient experienced heart failure surgery remove cardiac bypass .
DOC.brief_title: CentriMag Ventricular Assist System Treating Failure-to-Wean From Cardiopulmonary Bypass Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 5 year 16 year , inclusive 2 . Inability wean cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) 1 . Body weight < 20 kg 2 . Severe aortic insufficiency 3 . Unrestricted intracardiac communication ( i.e . large VSD ) 4 . Pulmonary vascular resistance index ( PVRI ) > 10 IU 5 . Presence DIC 6 . On hemodialysis ( exclude hemofiltration ) 7 . Contraindications systemic anticoagulation 8 . Active systemic infection unresponsive antibiotic 9 . Unresolved malignancy 10 . On investigational VAS
